fields_of_interest: International co-operation and development, Environment, Research and innovation
eu_initiatives: European emission regulations, Stage V for non road machines, RDE tests, PEMS measurement
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
commission_expert_groups_and_other_simil: Working Group on Motor Vehicles#E01295#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=1295#Member#C#Heavy Duty Portable Emissions Measurement Systems Expert Group (HD PEMS)
goals__remit: We are the development center of ISUZU MOTORS Limited to develop and calibrate ISUZU diesel engines for road and non road vehicles to comply with European emission regulations.We are performing tests on test benches, chassis dyno's and public road. We are also providing Aftersales services for ISUZU products in Europe
